trans-unit.source: Contains information about the event that is raised when a window is closed.
trans-unit.target: Contiene información sobre el evento que se provoca cuando se cierra una ventana.

trans-unit.source: To subscribe to window-closed events, call <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Automation.AddAutomationEventHandler%2A>, specifying <xref:System.Windows.Automation.WindowPattern.WindowClosedEvent> in the `eventId` parameter and supplying an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] event handler that takes a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.WindowClosedEventArgs> parameter.
trans-unit.target: Para suscribirse a eventos de ventana cerrada, llame a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Automation.AddAutomationEventHandler%2A>, especificando <xref:System.Windows.Automation.WindowPattern.WindowClosedEvent> en el `eventId` parámetro y proporcionando un [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] controlador de eventos que toma un <xref:System.Windows.Automation.WindowClosedEventArgs> parámetro.

trans-unit.source: When your application receives a window-closed event, the `sender` parameter of the event handler cannot be used to obtain information about the window that has closed, because the corresponding [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element is no longer valid.
trans-unit.target: Cuando la aplicación recibe un evento de ventana cerrada, el `sender` parámetro del controlador de eventos no se puede usar para obtener información acerca de la ventana que se ha cerrado, porque el correspondiente [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] elemento ya no es válido.
Para obtener código de ejemplo, vea <xref:System.Windows.Automation.WindowClosedEventArgs.GetRuntimeId%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The runtime identifier of the window that has closed.
trans-unit.target: Identificador en tiempo de ejecución de la ventana que se ha cerrado.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.WindowClosedEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.WindowClosedEventArgs" />.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] runtime [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_id](~/includes/tlasharptla-id-md.md)] associated with this event.
trans-unit.target: Recupera el [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] en tiempo de ejecución de [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_id](~/includes/tlasharptla-id-md.md)] asociado a este evento.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] runtime ID of the window on which the event was raised.
trans-unit.target: Identificador de tiempo de ejecución del elemento [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] de la ventana en la que se generó el evento.

trans-unit.source: When your application receives a window-closed event, the `sender` parameter of the event handler cannot be used to obtain information about the window that has closed, because the corresponding [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tlasharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element is no longer valid.
trans-unit.target: Cuando la aplicación recibe un evento de ventana cerrada, el `sender` parámetro del controlador de eventos no se puede usar para obtener información acerca de la ventana que se ha cerrado, porque el correspondiente [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tlasharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] elemento ya no es válido.

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Windows.Automation.WindowClosedEventArgs.GetRuntimeId%2A> to match the window with a known identifier.
trans-unit.target: Use <xref:System.Windows.Automation.WindowClosedEventArgs.GetRuntimeId%2A> para que coincida con la ventana con un identificador conocido.

trans-unit.source: In the following example, the handler for the window-closed event ascertains whether the runtime ID of the closed window is in a list of the IDs of open windows.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente, el controlador para el evento de cierre de ventana determina si el identificador en tiempo de ejecución de la ventana cerrada está en una lista de los identificadores de ventanas abiertas.

trans-unit.source: If the runtime ID is present, it is removed from the list.
trans-unit.target: Si el identificador en tiempo de ejecución está presente, se quita de la lista.
